EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to a Neon light Decoration Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr./Ms. {!Contact.LastName},
To celebrate the Golden Week, we are excited to invite you to join our Neon Light Decoration Workshop and enjoy exclusive privileges at RIMOWA Galaxy.
Date: October 1st â€“ 6th , 2022 Time: 2:00 PM - 6:00 PM
Should you be interested in joining the workshop, I would be more than happy to reserve your booking.
We look forward to welcoming you at our boutique!
Kind regards,
